Package cz.fel.cvut.openk8s.migration.service

Interface KubernetesService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KubernetesServiceBean
    public interface KubernetesService
    Service is used to manipulate with Kubernetes cluster

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void destoy()
      Destroys user session and connection to the cluster
      ClusterInfoResource getClusterInfoSimple()
      Returns Kubernetes cluster structure as tree.
      java.lang.String getInfo​(java.lang.String namespace, java.lang.String kind, java.lang.String name)
      This method returns information for Kubernetes object in YAML format.
      io.fabric8.kubernetes.client.KubernetesClient getKubernetesClient()  
      StatusResource init​(java.lang.String kubeip, java.lang.String authType, java.lang.String tokenId, java.lang.String tokenSecret, java.lang.String token)
      This method creates connection to Kubernetes cluster.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        StatusResource init​(java.lang.String kubeip,
                    java.lang.String authType,
                    java.lang.String tokenId,
                    java.lang.String tokenSecret,
                    java.lang.String token)
        This method creates connection to Kubernetes cluster. Connection is tested with listing pods command
        Parameters:
        kubeip - URL of kubernetes cluster master
        authType - authentication type. Use 'boot' for Bootstrap token, 'token' for ServiceAccount or User token
        tokenId - Bootstrap token ID, is used only with 'boot' authentication type
        tokenSecret - Bootstrap token secret, is used only with 'boot' authentication type
        token - ServiceAccount or User token, is used only with 'token' authentication type
        Returns:
        status of connection

      • getClusterInfoSimple

        ClusterInfoResource getClusterInfoSimple()
        Returns Kubernetes cluster structure as tree.
        Returns:
        cluster structure
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if cluster connection was not initialized or was expired

      • getInfo

        java.lang.String getInfo​(java.lang.String namespace,
                         java.lang.String kind,
                         java.lang.String name)
                  throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        This method returns information for Kubernetes object in YAML format. Output is the same as "kubectl -n namespace kinf item -o yaml".
        Parameters:
        namespace - item namespace, nullable
        kind - item kind, case insensitive
        name - item name
        Returns:
        YAML konfiguration
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if item cannot be serialized
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if cluster connection was not initialized or was expired

      • destoy

        void destoy()
        Destroys user session and connection to the cluster

      • getKubernetesClient

        io.fabric8.kubernetes.client.KubernetesClient getKubernetesClient()
        Returns:
        kubernetes client, connected to the cluster
